Public availability of network security dashboard| |v1.1| Modification around Route Tables, Added Network Security Groups, Added PaaS Services| |v1.2| Added support for PaaS Firewalls and Virtual WAN| |v1.3| Added support for App Services| |v1.4| Added support for Key Vaults| |v1.5| Added support for Event Hubs, DNS Server + Peerings| |v1.5.1| Added Public Endpoint and Azure Service Firewall columns to Azure Key Vault, Added Allow Key Auth column to Storage Accounts, Added Subnets Overview, Private DNS VNET Links, and IP Forwarding to Internal Networking |v1.5.2| Added AKS view with Managed Resource Group, Azure Policy Compliance view group by Resource Types, App Service Access Restrictions, VMs with Public IP and NSG |v1.6| Group restructuring, Added Route Server + NAT Gateway & Private DNS Resolver, minor changes to the design / output values. |v1.6.1| Added Storage Account reporting on Infrastructure Encryption + Minimal TLS Version to surface accounts without TLS1.2 set due to TLS1.0 and 1.1 removal on November 1, 2024. |v1.6.2| Added Outbound Access, Administrator Login, and Minimal TLS Version to SQL Server view. ","style":"info"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"Info","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Change Log"},"name":"ChangeLog"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### FAQ Use this workbook to have an aggrgated view across your all network security resources including security recommendations! #### Q: What is the data source for this workbook? * **Answer**: This workbook utlizes Azure Resource Graph (ARG) queries to show real-time network security and network assests and thier configuration. #### Q: Can I edit or update the queries in the workbook? * **Answer**: Yes, you can customize this workbook and its queries by clicking on the editing the workbook and then clicking on the Edit button for a specific query you want to update. #### Q: How do I get future versions of this workbook? * **Answer**: This workbook is available on the community repository (GitHub), any new versions will be available at [this](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Security-Center/tree/main/Workbooks) location and you will be able to re-deploy a new version anytime you want. #### Q: How do I provide feedback? * **Answer**: You can provide feedback by using the attached survey link in the top section of the workbook or by clicking [here](http://aka.ms/NetSecWorkbookSurvey). #### Q: How do I get support? * **Answer**: All artifacts within the community repository are provided as is, without SLA or official support. However, if you have an issue please fill out a [bug report](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Security-Center/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&template=bug_report.md&title=Network security workbook) and the community will try to solve
